verses.verse: In the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> <S%H3947>himself,<s%> and took the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham,<s%> and <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3076>Jehohanan,<s%> and <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5744>Obed,<s%> and <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5718>Adaiah,<s%> and <S%H478>Elishaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2147>Zichri,<s%> into covenant with <S%H1285>him.<s%>

They went <S%H5437>about<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H6908>gathered<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> out of all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' households of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

All the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H4428>king<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%> He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4428>them,<s%> "Behold, the king's <S%H1121>son<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> concerning the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>

This is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that you shall <S%H6213>do.<s%> A third <S%H7992>part<s%> of <S%H935>you,<s%> who come in on the <S%H7676>Sabbath,<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> shall be <S%H7778>porters<s%> of the <S%H5592>thresholds.<s%>

A third <S%H7992>part<s%> shall be at the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house;<s%> and a third <S%H7992>part<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H3247>foundation.<s%> All the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be in the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>

But let no one <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> except the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and those who <S%H8334>minister<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%> They shall come <S%H935>in,<s%> for they are <S%H6944>holy,<s%> but all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H8104>follow<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4931>instructions.<s%>

The <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H5362>surround<s%> <S%H5439>the<s%> <S%H4428>king,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H3627>weapons<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%> Whoever <S%H935>comes<s%> into the <S%H1004>house,<s%> let him be <S%H4191>slain.<s%> Be with the <S%H4428>king<s%> when he comes <S%H935>in,<s%> and when he goes <S%H3318>out.<s%>"

So the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> and all <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to all that <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6680>commanded:<s%> and they <S%H3947>took<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H376>men,<s%> those who were to come <S%H935>in<s%> on the <S%H7676>Sabbath;<s%> with those who were to <S%H3318>go<s%> out on the <S%H7676>Sabbath;<s%> for <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6358>didn't<s%> dismiss the <S%H4256>shift.<s%>

<S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> to the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%> the <S%H2595>spears,<s%> and <S%H4043>bucklers,<s%> and <S%H7982>shields,<s%> that had been <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>'s, which were in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

He <S%H5975>set<s%> all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H7973>weapon<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> from the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> to the <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> along by the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

Then they brought <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H5145>crown<s%> on <S%H5715>him,<s%> and gave him the testimony, and made him <S%H4427>king:<s%> and <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H559>him;<s%> and they said, "Long <S%H2421>live<s%> the <S%H4428>king!<s%>"

When <S%H6271>Athaliah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7323>running<s%> and <S%H1984>praising<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> she <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%>

and she <S%H7200>looked,<s%> <S%H4428>and,<s%> behold, the king <S%H5975>stood<s%> by his <S%H5982>pillar<s%> at the <S%H3996>entrance,<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> and the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> by the <S%H4428>king;<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8056>rejoiced,<s%> and <S%H8628>blew<s%> <S%H2689>trumpets;<s%> the <S%H7891>singers<s%> also played <S%H7892>musical<s%> <S%H3627>instruments,<s%> and <S%H3045>led<s%> the singing of <S%H1984>praise.<s%> Then <S%H6271>Athaliah<s%> <S%H7167>tore<s%> her <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7195>"Treason!<s%> <S%H7195>treason!<s%>"

<S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> brought <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%> who were set <S%H6485>over<s%> the <S%H2428>army,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3318>them,<s%> "Bring her out between the <S%H1004>ranks;<s%> and whoever <S%H935>follows<s%> <S%H4191>her,<s%> let him be slain with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>" For the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4191>"Don't<s%> kill her in the <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>"

So they <S%H7760>made<s%> <S%H3027>way<s%> for <S%H935>her.<s%> She went to the <S%H3996>entrance<s%> of the <S%H5483>horse<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house;<s%> and they killed her <S%H4191>there.<s%>

<S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> between <S%H5971>himself,<s%> and all the people, and the <S%H4428>king,<s%> that they should be <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H5971>people.<s%>

All the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and broke it <S%H5422>down,<s%> and <S%H7665>broke<s%> his <S%H4196>altars<s%> and his <S%H6754>images<s%> in <S%H7665>pieces,<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H4977>Mattan<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altars.<s%>

<S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H7760>appointed<s%> the <S%H6486>officers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> whom <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H2505>distributed<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H5927>offer<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> with <S%H8057>rejoicing<s%> and with <S%H7892>singing,<s%> according to the <S%H3027>order<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>

He <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H7778>porters<s%> at the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that no one who was <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H1697>anything<s%> should enter <S%H935>in.<s%>

He <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> and the <S%H117>nobles,<s%> and the <S%H4910>governors<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and brought <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H8432>through<s%> the <S%H5945>upper<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3427>set<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdom.<s%>

So all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiced,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H8252>quiet.<s%> <S%H6271>Athaliah<s%> they had <S%H4191>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
